mapper.select: SELECT p.empNo, intro, imageFilename, pwd, tel, email, TO_CHAR(birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD')birth, TO_CHAR(enterDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')enterDate FROM profile p JOIN employee e ON p.empNo = e.empNo JOIN career c ON p.empNo = c.empNo WHERE p.empNo = #{empNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE profile SET intro=#{intro}, imageFilename=#{imageFilename} WHERE empNo=#{empNo}
UPDATE employee SET pwd=#{pwd} WHERE empNo=#{empNo}
